definition: to lose sth abstract but important (courage, authority, one's life etc)/to be bereaved of (one's spouse etc)/to die/disappointed/discouraged
to use up/to exhaust/to end/to finish/to the utmost/exhausted/finished/to the limit (of sth)/all/entirely

sentences.english: These regressive minds here need to here the truth.
sentences.chinese: 這些喪盡天良的人需要在這裏聽一聽真相。

sentences.english: He who has no conscience have nothing.

definition: lit. not even the chickens and dogs are left undisturbed (idiom)/fig. great commotion/pandemonium
not recognizing one's family (idiom); self-centered and not making any allowances for the needs of one's relatives
lit. small belly, chicken's gut (idiom); narrow-minded/petty

lit. to assess the head and discuss the feet (idiom); minute criticism of a woman's appearance/fig. to find fault in minor details/to remark upon a person's appearance/nitpicking/overcritical/judgmental
to have a high notion of one's duty/to be highly principled
to patch up one's lie (when inconsistencies appear)/to cover (for sb who has lied)
lit. spouting smoke through the seven orifices (idiom)/fig. to seethe with anger
to extort under false pretenses/to blackmail/to bluff/to defraud
